name: Ryan Burgess
bio: Ryan is a UI Engineer Manager at Netflix. His favorite happy hour beverage is a old fashioned. Ryan moved to San Francisco from Toronto and has no plans on moving back. California is just too nice. Ryan has always been a fan of tattoos and graffiti.

name: Augustus Yuan
bio: Augustus is a Frontend Engineer at Evernote. He loves quotes, is constantly curious, and has a strong passion for the frontend. He is also slightly obsessed with the drama House and coffee.

name: Derrick Showers
bio: UI Engineer at LinkedIn | I love steak, sushi, San Francisco, boats, whiskey (and yes, occasionally Fernet) | Spontaneity is the key to life

name: Ryan Anklam
bio: Ryan is a Senior UI Engineer at Netflix. He loves React, The Simpsons, runninng, and Taylor Swift.

name: Sarah Federman
bio: Sarah is a UI Engineer at LinkedIn. Addicted to sushi, burritos, sushirittos, alcohol, and sarcasm.
